brainly_data.question: President Roosevelt was able to get a lot done during his first two terms in office. After that, he was able to accomplish very little. What are two reasons why so little was done?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: President Roosevelt was able to get a lot done during his first two terms in office. After that, he was able to accomplish very little. What are two reasons why so little was done?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
For one, he had a hostile congress after that.
Also, economic conditions also played a factor in that.
